core_principles: No Pure Black (#000000) - Use #0A0A0A or #111111 for richness
Gold is an Accent, Not a Background
Typography is the Hero - Playfair Display for elegance
Texture over Flatness - Use subtle noise or grain
Motion should be slow and fluid (Parallax, Fade-ins)

grid_system.menu_grid: grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-2 gap-x-12 gap-y-8

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 rounded-none uppercase tracking-widest px-8 py-3 text-sm font-bold transition-all duration-300
buttons.outline: border border-primary text-primary hover:bg-primary hover:text-primary-foreground rounded-none uppercase tracking-widest px-8 py-3 text-sm font-bold transition-all duration-300
buttons.ghost: text-primary hover:text-primary/80 uppercase tracking-widest text-sm font-bold

cards.menu_item: group relative flex justify-between items-start border-b border-white/10 pb-6 hover:border-primary/50 transition-colors
cards.feature_card: bg-card border border-white/5 p-8 hover:border-primary/30 transition-all duration-500 hover:-translate-y-1

navigation.style: fixed top-0 w-full z-50 transition-all duration-300

hero.alt: Dimly lit luxury Thai restaurant interior with gold accents

private_dining.alt: Intimate private dining space with warm lighting

menu_highlights.alt: Authentic Pad Thai with vibrant plating

icons.style: Stroke width 1.5px, Gold color on hover

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. SETUP: Install necessary packages: `npm install framer-motion clsx tailwind-merge lucide-react`.
2. THEME: Update `tailwind.config.js` with the colors provided in this JSON. Ensure `darkMode: 'class'` is set.
3. FONTS: Import 'Playfair Display' (400, 700) and 'DM Sans' (400, 500, 700) from Google Fonts in `index.css`.
4. COMPONENTS: Build 'Section' component that defaults to `py-20 bg-background text-foreground`.
5. MOTION: Use `framer-motion` for all entrances. Default to `initial={{ opacity: 0, y: 20 }} whileInView={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }} viewport={{ once: true }}`.
6. IMAGES: Use the provided URLs. For the 'Gallery' page, create a masonry layout using the food and interior images mixed.
7. NAVIGATION: Create a sticky navbar that changes from transparent to `bg-background/80` on scroll.
8. FORMS: Use standard HTML forms styled with Tailwind. Inputs should have `bg-transparent border-b border-muted focus:border-primary` (underline style) for a premium feel.
9. FOOTER: Large footer with 'Charm Thai' logo in Playfair Display, Gold color. Include 'Opening Hours' and 'Location'.
10. TESTING: Add `data-testid` to all interactive elements (buttons, links, inputs).
universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for backgrounds, only solid rich blacks.
Text must never be pure white (#FFFFFF), use #F5F0E8.
Buttons should be sharp (rounded-none) or slightly rounded (rounded-sm) - NO full rounded pills.
Always add hover states: Gold text should glow or brighten.
